DOC.brief_summary: INSIGHT postmarket clinical follow-up study European Union . The purpose study continue evaluate safety effectiveness/performance Incraft subject abdominal aortic aneurysm require endovascular repair routine clinical practice . Approximately 150 subject enrol follow 5-years postprocedure . Up 25 site Europe may participate .
DOC.brief_title: European ( EU ) Post Approval Study INCRAFT® AAA Stent Graft System Subjects With Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: INSIGHT postmarket clinical follow-up study European Union . The purpose study continue evaluate safety effectiveness/performance Incraft subject abdominal aortic aneurysm require endovascular repair routine clinical practice . Approximately 150 subject enrol follow 5-years postprocedure . Up 25 site Europe may participate . Subjects enrol follow 1 month 6 month post-procedure annually 5 year .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male Female age 18 year old 2 . Femoral access vessel adequate fit select delivery system 3 . Proximal neck length ≥ 10mm 4 . Aortic neck diameter ≥ 17mm ≤ 31mm 5 . Aortic neck suitable suprarenal fixation 6 . Infrarenal suprarenal neck angulation ≤ 60° 7 . Iliac fixation length ≥ 15mm 8 . Iliac diameter ≥ 7mm ≤ 22mm 9 . Minimum overall AAA treatment length ( proximal landing location distal landing location ) ≥ 128mm 10 . Morphology suitable aneurysm repair 11 . Provide write informed consent applicable write confidentiality authorization prior initiation study procedures 12 . Subject willing comply specify followup evaluation schedule 1 . Subject one following : 1 . Aneurysm sac rupture leak abdominal aortic aneurysm 2 . Mycotic , dissecting , inflammatory abdominal aortic aneurysm 2 . Known allergy intolerance nickel titanium ( nitinol ) , Polyethylene terephthalate ( PET ) , polytetrafluoroethylene ( PTFE ) 3 . Known contraindication undergo angiography anticoagulation 4 . Existing AAA surgical graft and/or AAA stentgraft system 5 . Women child bear potential pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant course trial
